import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'] }) export class LoginComponent { }
Rotten Potatoes
Rotten Potatoes is the world's most trustes recommandation resource. One of the reasons why Rotten Potatoes has gained such a strong reputation is because of its unique rating system. Rather than simply providing an average score based on user ratings.
